revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=DeWalt |model=DCT100 |revision= |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gateworks |manuf_model=Ventana GW5520 |fcc_date=11/27/2017 |fcc_id=TK4WLE200N2-23, XQ8WLE200N5-23ESD, YJ7DCT100 |ic_id=9082A-DCT100 |type=industrial access point |pwr_v=120 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_ac_hz=60 |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6DL;MCIMX6U, 7CVM08AC; <!-- [http://www.ameya360.com/search/MCIMX6U/1 MCIMX6U] - i.MX6DL DualLite (ARM Cortex-A9) --> |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F2G08ABAEAH4-IT:E |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125 IT:K |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header |wi1_module=Compex WLE200N2-23 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283;AR9283-AL1A, FK702YXJ, 1702, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Compex WLE200N5-23-ESD |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9280 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microchip;SST12LP15A;;2; ,,, SPDT Switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85601;SKY, 85601, 629MM;2;;16-pin QFN;2.5 mm x 2.5mm; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microchip;SST11LP12;SST, 11LP12, 6270SR;2; ,,, 6-lane, 6-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8606;PLX, Technology (R), PEX8606-BA50BI G, 1539, 3BJLF3 TAIWAN;1; |flags=IP67 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui=04:F0:21 |oui_eth=04:F0:21 }} {{TagLine|Jobsite WiFi System}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.dewalt.com/jobsite-solutions/jobsite-wifi-system}} <small> "VENTANA NETWORK PROCESSOR", "GATEWORKS CORPORATION", "PCB 02210147-03", :and "COPYRIGHT 2017"</small> are silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos.
According to the Gateworks [http://trac.gateworks.com/wiki/ventana/errata Ventana Errata] page, the 02210147-03 PCB code :corresponds to the [[Gateworks Ventana GW5520]]-D
The board has been customized including removal of the HDMI, USB, and barrel power plugs.
*[http://www.gateworks.com/imx6-single-board-computers-gateworks-ventana-family/item/ventana-gw5520-single-board-computer ''Gateworks Ventana GW5520'' Product page] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/gateworks/gateworks_ventanagw5520 ''Gateworks Ventana GW5520'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([http://trac.gateworks.com/wiki/ventana/withoutpcieswitch ''GateWorks'' wiki]) *[http://linuxgizmos.com/linux-friendly-i-mx6-sbc-offers-dual-gbe-poe-hdmi/ ''Linux-friendly i.MX6 SBC offers dual-GbE, PoE, HDMI'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
